title: Respecting differences
creator_contributor_role: New South Wales Government, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/New South Wales
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Ethnic groups
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Race discrimination
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social problems
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children of immigrants
description: Shows the difficulties that migrant children have in adjusting to Australian schools and culture, especially non-English speaking children. Recently the New South Wales Government has given funds to support the teaching of ethnic languages in many state schools which helps facilitate adjustment to Australian life.
